mapper.sql: solution_id, problem_id, solution_content, solution_fraction, create_time, modify_time, status
mapper.select: SELECT solution_fraction FROM solution WHERE problem_id = #{problemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY solution_fraction DESC
mapper.insert: insert into solution (solution_id, problem_id, solution_content, solution_fraction, create_time, modify_time, status) values (#{solutionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{problemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{solutionContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{solutionFraction,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into solution
solution_id,
problem_id,
solution_content,
solution_fraction,
create_time,
modify_time,
status,

mapper.update:
update solution
problem_id = #{problemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
solution_content = #{solutionContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
solution_fraction = #{solutionFraction,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where solution_id = #{solutionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update solution set problem_id = #{problemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, solution_content = #{solutionContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, solution_fraction = #{solutionFraction,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where solution_id = #{solutionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into solution (solution_id, problem_id, solution_content, solution_fraction, create_time, modify_time, status) values
(#{item.solutionId},#{item.problemId},#{item.solutionContent}, #{item.solutionFraction},#{item.createTime},#{item.modifyTime},#{item.status})
